heuristic_description: All nouns, verbs, or adjectives in the statement also appeared in the text
heuristic_example: This means that every contentful word that appears in the statement must have appeared in the text as well. However, it's acceptable to introduce new 'function words', such as the, can, should, that, at, in, near, and, but, any, he, she, they, is, was, etc. It's also acceptable to change the tense of a verb or to make a noun plural/singular in order to make sure the sentence is grammatically correct.
